Today in County Clare, it's a bit rough with 7 ft @13s WSW swell but fresh 20 mph S winds making it blown out. Tomorrow sees similar conditions with the swell holding at 7 ft @9s, but winds ramping up to 27 mph WSW, keeping it messy. The day after, the swell drops to 5 ft @10s, but the winds pick up even more to 37 mph S, making it quite challenging. Best: today.
